body.name: SRhonyra AMD Radeon RX580 4GB Graphics Card GDDR5 6HDMI Graphics Video Card GPU PCI-Express 128-Bit Placa De Video
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 16 mins
features: AMD RX 580 2048SP GPU, 4GB 256bit GDDR5 high-speed video memory.

HDMI interface x6 direct output, built-in 6-way independent hd audio, without conversion interface, more stable. Support for single screen 4k super x21,3x2,5x1,1x5 and other splicing 8k TV wall, large screen.
Support h264 / h265 / hevc video hardware coding and decoding, do not occupy cpu resources, and easily and smoothly play 4k / 8k video.
Support for projection fusion applications such as unity3d.Industrial control grade design materials, stable and durable.

It is suitable for film and television projection fusion, financial stock speculation, office, monitoring, indoor and outdoor advertising splicing large screen display and other engineering applications
Extended warranty included with every graphics card purchase. User registration required on SRhonyra website.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SRhonyra 6HDMI Multiple Monitors Graphics Card RX 580 4GB GDDR5 Video Card

Dual-slot width This 6×HDMI dual outputs graphics card comes with a full-height bracket, fits your multiple screens projects well. 6-monitor graphics card Support for up to 6 Displays: HDMI 4K resolutions 3840×2160 @30Hz(singel screen) ; 11520×4320 @30Hz (Splicing screens) Energy Efficient This mutli-screen video card total requires only 80 watts of power from the PCIe 3.0 x16 bus & 6-Pin connector. Recommended 400 ~ 450 watts or greater power supply. 6 Audio Outputs This discrete HDMI outputs graphcis card support 6 channel audio out via cable. Please change the setting for the playback device enable HDMI audio output.

How multiple monitors system can benefit your business In a digital-first world, everything lives on the screen. It is hard to try to jump between windows to get work done efficiently. For a personal user, the multiple monitors setup will boost your productivity, saving your time and energe, as you will have plenty of screen real estate, no need to reduce the window sizes to show more on the single screen, no more often tabbing back and forth between windows. For enterprised users, the system will ensure your business stands out from the crowd. Featuring editable display, you could use it to show your latest products and services and inform potential buyers about the inventory available. Connect up to 2 displays with support for resolutions up to 4K resolution, you could not only use it for a video wall, restaurant signage, but also a home theater setups, and welcome monitors. Package Included: • SRhonyra 6HDMI multiple monitors graphics card • User manual OS Support: • Windows 11 - 64 bit • Windows 10 64 bit • Windows 7 64 bit * HDMI2.0 cable recommended*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need quad monitor support? Here it is.
reviews.reviewText: NOTE: I downloaded the Windows drivers, but the installer kept complaining about an unsupported OS. I was installing on Windows 11 Home, which is on the list of supported operating systems. In this case, Windows detected the video card and installed the nVidia app without my intervention. I suspect, based on this, that Windows 10 will behave the same way.I do contract IT work, and one of my clients bought a new desktop with monitor. Client had three 32" TVs already wall-mounted. Client wanted to have stock market info on the wall-mounted TVs. I'd never done that kind of setup before, so I took a chance on this card. It worked perfectly on the Win11 desktop - Windows installed the driver automagically and I was able to easily extend the desktop across all four monitors/TVs.Give this card a chance - it's an excellent deal for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the ATI 6 monitor card - BY FAR!!!
reviews.reviewText: This installed in minutes, loaded the drivers from manufacturer's website and gave me not one drop of trouble setting up and configuring 6 monitors, WITHOUT using the AMD software at all. I only needed to use the Windows 10 Monitor configuration window. Also, no problems with "active vs non-active HDMI cables when using HDMI-to-Mini-Display Port cables. FINALLY!!! someone has made a reasonably priced 6-monitor PCIEX16 card that works without headaches!!! BRAVO!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low fan noise
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about the fan's noise level. And to my surprise, it is really quiet and hardly noticeable. Comparing to the noisy old VisionTek card I was replacing, it's like day and night. And also very easy install and works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have 4 monitors connected to my computer. I could add 2 more if I wanted to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have 6 monitors running. Excellent for trading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AAA+ product and customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Before I bought this I was pleasantly surprised that they had a real support line and within 1 minute not only did I get a tech on line but he answered my questions. The card came yesterday and I installed it and Nvidias site had an automatic software option and downloaded everything I needed in a few minutes... It works beautiful.... I couldn't be happier!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When ordering be sure you know what monitor cables you plan to use and order outputs accordingly.
reviews.reviewText: GREAT GRAPHICS CARD, RUNS 4 MONITORS PERFECTLY.
